homePage.title: Yevhenii Madzhar – Fullstack Developer
homePage.description: Fullstack developer crafting modern, responsive, and high-performance web applications with a focus on both frontend and backend excellence.

hero.description: With over 3 years of experience creating beautiful, responsive, and high-performing web applications, I specialize in fullstack development — delivering everything from sleek user interfaces to reliable backend systems using modern technologies.

skills.description: I combine solid frontend expertise with practical backend development, intuitive UI/UX design, and a strong focus on performance and tooling. I strive to create seamless, maintainable, and user-friendly web applications.
